name: Expenses of court proceeding
text: Whenever a circuit court certifies that there was probable cause for issuing a citation and taking proceedings under this chapter, the director of finance shall pay from the tax reserve fund provided in section 231-23(c)(2), or allow, all expenses incurred for services of citation and other lawful disbursements that have not otherwise been paid. [L 1983, c 217, pt of §1]
